name: Battle Soda 3310
description:
I didn't want to miss the jam so I rushed the game a little bit this time.  I will work on the game to get it into a better state. Soon the bugs are going to fixed, visuals will be polished and the game will be repackaged.

Goal

Fill the cup with soda the way you're ordered to,

you will loose soda when you mess up or let the sinks flow

If you run out of soda you loose  !

Controls

Use the numeric keys "1", "2" , "3" to use the vending machine slots and let the soda flow

Bugs and Missing Features

Unfortunately the game is incomplete in many aspects:

  • Don't open more than one vending machine slot at the same time
  • The game starts immediately after launch
  • No game over screen, when you loose the game sets you back to Level 1
